name: DiceMatch (mssj_ludumdare)
description:
Match The number of the Front Side Of the Dice with the Other Dices!!!

My third submission to gmtk game jam

other submissions:

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1620588

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam-2022/rate/1617167

The Dice is a Normal Dice(Opposite Sides add to 7)

Rotate the Dice with arrow keys:

up -> rotate backwards

down -> Rotate Forwards

Right -> Rotate to Right

Left -> Rotate To Left
